00022 /**
00023  * @file   QuantDabg.h
00024  * @author Chuck Sugnet
00025  * @date   Thu Dec 29 16:15:28 2005
00026  * 
00027  * @brief Class for doing Detected Above BackGround (DABG) analysis. Idea is to
00028  * use the intensity of probes in a probeset to calculate a p-value for the
00029  * entire probeset. The individual intensities are compared to a set of
00030  * background probes.
00031  */
00032 #ifndef _QUANTDABG_H_
00033 #define _QUANTDABG_H_
00034 
00035 //
00036 #include "chipstream/ChipStream.h"
00037 #include "chipstream/IntensityMart.h"
00038 #include "chipstream/PmAdjuster.h"
00039 #include "chipstream/ProbeSet.h"
00040 #include "chipstream/QuantExprMethod.h"
00041 //
00042 #include "dabg/Dabg.h"
00043 #include "util/Err.h"
00044 //
00045 #include <cstring>
00046 #include <string>
00047 #include <vector>

00050 /// our standardized name
00051 #define QUANTDABGSTR "dabg"
00052 
00053 /**
00054  * @brief Class for doing Detected Above BackGround (DABG) analysis. Idea is to
00055  * use the intensity of probes in a probeset to calculate a p-value for the
00056  * entire probeset. The individual intensities are compared to a set of
00057  * background probes.
00058  */
00059 class QuantDabg : public QuantExprMethod {
00060 
00061 public:
00062 
00063   /** 
00064    * What version of the algorithm are we implementing?
00065    * @return version string.
00066    */
00067   std::string getVersion() {
00068     return "2.0";
00069   }
00070 
00071   /**
00072    * Constructor.
00073    */
00074   QuantDabg(bool doFisher, bool doPercentile, double percentile, bool reportLog, int adjustment) :
00075     m_DoFisher(doFisher), 
00076         m_DoPercentile(doPercentile), 
00077     m_PercentileEst(percentile), 
00078         m_ReportLog(reportLog), 
00079         m_Adjustment(adjustment)
00080 { 
00081                 if(m_DoPercentile && m_DoFisher) 
00082                   Err::errAbort("QuantDabg::QuantDabg() - Can't do chisq and percentile at same time.");
00083 
00084                 setupSelfDoc(*this);
00085                 m_Type = getDocName();
00086                 m_DabgInit = false;
00087                 setOptValue("chisq", doFisher);
00088                 setOptValue("percentile", ToStr(m_PercentileEst));
00089                 setOptValue("usepercentile", doPercentile);
00090                 setOptValue("neglog10", reportLog);
00091                 m_GCCN_preprocessed = false;
00092   }
00093 
00094   /** 
00095    * @brief Does this quantification method estimate feature effects?
00096    * @return false as we don't have feature effects.
00097    */
00098   inline bool haveFeatureEffects() { return false;}
00099 
00100   /** 
00101    * @brief Does this quantification method supply residuals?
00102    * @return false as dabg doesn't have a residual
00103    */
00104   inline bool haveResiduals() { return true;}
00105 
00106   inline double getResidual(unsigned int probeIx, unsigned int chipIx) { 
00107     return m_ProbePvals[chipIx][probeIx];
00108   }
00109 
00110   /** 
00111    * @brief Get the feature effect of a particular probe.
00112    * @param probeIx - Index of probe in probe sets.
00113    * @return feature (probe) effects.
00114    */
00115   inline double getFeatureEffect(unsigned int probeIx) {
00116     Err::errAbort("Don't do feature effects.");
00117     return -1;
00118   } 
00119 
00120   /** 
00121    * Which probes should be used as the background distribution.
00122    * @param bgProbes - vector of probes to be used, memory 
00123    * owned elsewhere.
00124    */
00125   void setBgProbes(const std::vector<Probe *> &bgProbes);
00126 
00127   /** 
00128    * Which probes should be used as the background distribution.
00129    * @param bgProbes - vector of probe ids to be used, memory 
00130    * owned elsewhere.
00131    */
00132   void setBgProbes(const std::vector<int> &bgProbes);
00133 
00134   /** 
00135    * How many probes are in the background list?
00136    * @return - number of probes being used for background.
00137    */
00138   uint32_t getBgProbeCount() {
00139     return (uint32_t) m_BgProbes.size();
00140   }
00141 
00142   void setParameters(PsBoard &board) {
00143     DataStore *info = board.getProbeInfo();
00144     std::vector<int> bgProbes;
00145     info->getGcControlProbes(bgProbes);
00146     setBgProbes(bgProbes);
00147     info->getProbeGc(m_ProbeGcVec);
00148   }
00149 
00150   /** 
00151    * @brief Get the p-value that a probeset came from the background
00152    * distribution for a particular chip.
00153    *
00154    * @param chipIx - Index of chip in experiment.
00155    * @return p-value for probeset in particular chip.
00156    */
00157   inline double getSignalEstimate(unsigned int chipIx) {
00158     assert(chipIx < m_ChipCount);
00159     return m_SetPvals[chipIx];
00160   }
00161 
00162   /** 
00163    * @brief Alias for getSignalEstimate().
00164    * @param chipIx - Index of chip in experiment.
00165    * @return p-value for probeset in particular chip.
00166    */
00167   inline double getTargetEffect(unsigned int chipIx) { 
00168     return getSignalEstimate(chipIx);
00169   }
00170 
00171   /** 
00172    * Nothing to clear yet. 
00173    */
00174   void clear() {}
00175 
00176   /** 
00177    * @brief Set the PM data at probe set probe index and chip index.
00178    * 
00179    * @param probeIx - Index of probe in probe set.
00180    * @param chipIx - Index of chip.
00181    * @param data - Data to be set.
00182    */
00183   inline void setPMDataAt(unsigned int probeIx, unsigned int chipIx, double data) {
00184     assert(chipIx < m_ChipCount && probeIx < m_ProbeCount);
00185     m_PM[chipIx][probeIx] = data;
00186   }
00187 
00188 /** 
00189    * @brief Get the PM data at probe set probe index and chip index.
00190    * 
00191    * @param probeIx - Index of probe in probe set.
00192    * @param chipIx - Index of chip.
00193    */
00194   inline double getPMDataAt(unsigned int probeIx, unsigned int chipIx) {
00195     assert(chipIx < m_ChipCount && probeIx < m_ProbeCount);
00196         return (double) m_PM[chipIx][probeIx];
00197   }
00198 
00199   /** 
00200    * @brief Set the MM data at probe set probe index and chip
00201    * index. Currently a no-operation as dabg doesn't use mm probes.
00202    * 
00203    * @param probeIx - Index of probe in probe set.
00204    * @param chipIx - Index of chip.
00205    * @param data - Data to be set.
00206    */
00207   inline void setMMDataAt(unsigned int probeIx, unsigned int chipIx, double data) {}
00208 
00209   /** 
00210    * Set the number of probes and number of chips to be used for estimation.
00211    * @param numProbes - Probe count.
00212    * @param numChips - Microarray count.
00213    */
00214   void setBounds(unsigned int numProbes, unsigned int numChips);
00215 
00216   /** 
00217    * What scale are the target effects on? Are they linear (like
00218    * plier) or log2 (like rma)
00219    * @return - What scale are the results provided in?
00220    */
00221   virtual Scale getScale() { return m_ReportLog ? NegLog10 : Pvalue; }
00222 
00223   /** 
00224    * What type of quantification method is this? Summarization like
00225    * plier detection like dabg.
00226    * @return - Type of quantification method.
00227    */
00228   virtual enum QuantType getQuantType() { return Detection; }
00229 
00230   /** 
00231    * @brief Do the heavy lifting of median polish. If PM-MM is zero
00232    * threshold at a small positive number to avoid taking logs of
00233    * numbers that aren't positive.
00234    */
00235   void computeEstimate();
00236 
00237   /** 
00238    * @brief Set up the quantification method given all the data about the probe
00239    * set, chip  and data.
00240    * 
00241    * @param psGroup - Probes to be used for final estimate.
00242    * @param iMart - Raw data from chips.
00243    * @param iTrans - Transformations to be applied to data before use.
00244    * @param pmAdjust - How to estimate background, or MM probe.
00245    * @return True if setup sucessful, false otherwise.
00246    */
00247   bool setUp(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup, const IntensityMart &iMart, 
00248              std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, PmAdjuster &pmAdjust);
00249 
00250   /** 
00251    * @brief Return number of features (probes).
00252    * @return feature count.
00253    */
00254   inline unsigned int getNumFeatures()  { return m_ProbeCount; }
00255 
00256   /** 
00257    * @brief Return number of targets (experiments or chips).
00258    * @return target count
00259    */
00260   inline unsigned int getNumTargets() { return m_ChipCount; }

00262   /** 
00263    * @brief Default Getter method for parameters and their documentation.
00264    * @return map of parameters and their descriptions.
00265    */
00266   static std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> getDefaultDocOptions() { 
00267     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts;
00268         SelfDoc::Opt chisq = {"chisq", SelfDoc::Opt::Boolean, "true", "true", "NA", "NA",
00269                           "Use Fisher's chi-squared method for combining individual probe p-values."};
00270     opts.push_back(chisq);
00271     SelfDoc::Opt usepercentile = {"usepercentile", SelfDoc::Opt::Boolean, "false", "false", "NA", "NA",
00272                           "Use a individual probe p-value at a particular percentile as the estimator."};
00273     opts.push_back(usepercentile);
00274     SelfDoc::Opt percentile = {"percentile", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, ".25", ".25", "0", "1",
00275                                "Percentile to use for the probe p-value as an estimator for the entire probeset."};
00276     opts.push_back(percentile);
00277     SelfDoc::Opt neglog10 = {"neglog10", SelfDoc::Opt::Boolean, "false", "false", "NA", "NA",
00278                              "Report -1 * log_10(p-value) rather than raw p-value."};
00279     opts.push_back(neglog10);
00280         SelfDoc::Opt adjust = {"adjust-dof", SelfDoc::Opt::Integer, "0", "0", "NA", "NA",
00281                        "Adjustment of the degrees of freedom for the chi-squared test."};
00282     opts.push_back(adjust);
00283         SelfDoc::Opt probeMd5 = {"subsetmd5", SelfDoc::Opt::String, "", "", "NA", "NA",
00284                              "Md5sum of the probe ids being used as background."};
00285     opts.push_back(probeMd5);
00286     return opts;
00287   }
00288 
00289   /** 
00290    * Fill in the information for Self documentation.
00291    * @param doc - Self documenter to be filled in.
00292    */
00293   static void setupSelfDoc(SelfDoc &doc) {
00294     doc.setDocName(QUANTDABGSTR);
00295     doc.setDocDescription("Calculates the p-value that the intensities in a probeset could have been observed by chance in a background distribution. Used as a substitute for standard absent/present calls when mismatch probes are not available.");
00296     doc.setDocOptions(getDefaultDocOptions());
00297   }
00298 
00299   /** 
00300    * @brief Supply a little how/what/why about the algorithms this
00301    * class performs and what parameters it takes.
00302    * @return SelfDoc
00303    */
00304   static SelfDoc explainSelf() { 
00305     SelfDoc doc;
00306     setupSelfDoc(doc);
00307     return doc;
00308   }

00310   /** 
00311    * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00312    * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00313    * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00314    * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00315    * 
00316    * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00317    * 
00318    * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00319    */
00320   static SelfCreate *newObject(std::map<std::string,std::string> &param);

00322   /**
00323    * @brief What should the residual file be called?
00324    */
00325   virtual const std::string &getResidualSuffix() {
00326     static std::string suffix = ".probe-pvalues.txt";
00327     return suffix;
00328   }

00330   /**
00331    * Specify the gc count for probes as indexed by position
00332    */
00333   void setGcProbes(const std::vector<char> &gcVec) {
00334     m_ProbeGcVec = gcVec;
00335   }

00337   /**
00338    * set the bgpFile name
00339    * @param bgpFile
00340    */
00341   void setBgpFileName(std::string bgpFile) {
00342     m_BgpFile = bgpFile;
00343   }
00344 
00345   void setGCCNpreprocessed (std::string analysis)
00346   {
00347           m_GCCN_preprocessed = false;
00348           if (analysis.find ("gc-correction") != 1) m_GCCN_preprocessed = true;
00349           else if (analysis.find ("gc-dabg") != 1) m_GCCN_preprocessed = true;
00350   }
00351 
00352 private:
00353   /** 
00354    * Setup the dabg objects with intensity data from background probes. This should
00355    * be called only once.
00356    * 
00357    * @param iMart - Contains data for background probes for each chip.
00358    * @param iTrans - Chipstream transformations for raw data in iMart.
00359    * @param pmAdjust - Adjuster for perfect match probes.
00360    */
00361   void initializeDabg(const IntensityMart &iMart, 
00362                       std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00363                       PmAdjuster &pmAdjust);
00364 
00365   /** 
00366    * Return the -1 * log_10(val). Val is capped at FLT_MIN to avoid taking lots of values <= 0. 
00367    * @param val - Regular p-value.
00368    * @return -1 * log_10(val)
00369    */
00370   double negLog10Prob(double val);
00371 
00372   /// Number of chips in experiment
00373   unsigned int m_ChipCount;
00374   /// Number of probes (features) in probe sets
00375   unsigned int m_ProbeCount;
00376   /// Data matrix for PM probes.
00377   std::vector<std::vector<double> > m_PM;
00378   /// G/C count for each probe in probeset being called
00379   std::vector<int> m_GcProbeCounts;
00380   /// P-values for probeset in different chips.
00381   std::vector<double> m_SetPvals;
00382   /// P-values for individual probes in different chips.
00383   std::vector<std::vector<double> > m_ProbePvals;
00384   /// Vector of probes to use as background distribution. Memory owned elsewhere
00385   std::vector<int> m_BgProbes;
00386   /// Have we initialized the dabg object with data yet?
00387   bool m_DabgInit;
00388   /// Objects implementing algorithm, one per chip.
00389   std::vector<affx::Dabg> m_Dabgs;
00390   /// Use Fisher's chi-squared method for combining individual probe p-values.
00391   bool m_DoFisher;
00392   /// Use a partcular percentile of probe p-values as an estimator.
00393   bool m_DoPercentile;
00394   /// Percentile of probe p-value to use as estimator.
00395   double m_PercentileEst;
00396   /// Should we report -1 * log_10(p-value) rather than raw p-value.
00397   double m_ReportLog;
00398   /// Adjust the degrees of freedom by one.
00399   int m_Adjustment;
00400   /// prior to running DABG - GCCN (GC Count Normalization) was run on the probe data
00401   bool m_GCCN_preprocessed;
00402   /// Md5sum of probe ids used for background
00403   std::string m_ProbeMd5Sum;
00404   /// GC count of each probe as indexed by position.
00405   std::vector<char> m_ProbeGcVec;
00406   /// Name of bgpFile
00407   std::string m_BgpFile;
00408 };
